com.sadakatsu.clue.exception

Class DisqualifiedPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.sadakatsu.clue.exception.DisqualifiedPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DisqualifiedPlayer
extends java.lang.Exception
    The DisqualifiedPlayer exception is thrown by the Match class if any of the Players passed to it to play the game were disqualified before being passed in to the Match constructor. Players are not allowed to participate in any more Matches after having been disqualified.
    Author:
    Joseph A. Craig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
